about_the_game:
WREST is a sci-fi/horror virtual reality game in which you play Andy Bishop, an engineer who wakes to discover a terrifying mystery unfolding in his home.

In this free to play demo level, you can explore the game world, inspect the items and examine clues. Combat and puzzle mechanics will play a larger part in future levels.

Part narrative experience, part escape room, the WREST universe will expand in 2020 with a full commercial release and a thrilling two-player game mode.

Enter the mystery @WrestVR and stay tuned for updates.

content_descriptors.notes: Please note this game contains scenes of graphic gore.

name: WREST Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • Sound Card: AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Additional Notes: Video Output: HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 or newer. USB Port: 1x USB 2.0 or newer

short_description: WREST is a sci-fi horror VR game. You play Andy Bishop, an engineer who wakes to discover a terrifying mystery unfolding in his home. Enter the mystery @WrestVR and stay tuned for updates.
